meanings.definition: The process or art of constructing with timber.
meanings.sent1: Learning timberwork involves using wood to build structures.
meanings.sent2: The timberwork on the house was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent3: The timberwork artist accidentally built a house upside down!
meanings.sent4: Her timberwork was as sturdy as an oak tree in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The intricate timberwork of the bridge stood out against the blue sky.

meanings.definition: The wooden framework of a building.
meanings.sent1: The timberwork of the cabin provided a strong foundation.
meanings.sent2: The old barn's timberwork showed signs of wear and tear.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the timberwork as a jungle gym.
meanings.sent4: The timberwork of the house embraced the warmth of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The timberwork creaked softly in the quiet of the night.
